Package org.programus.nxj.util.music

This package contains music support classes

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BGMBox BGMBox is the abbreviation of Background Music Box.
Music Music class represents a music.
MusicNote MusicNote class represents a note in music.
SheetParam SheetParam class is a normal java bean to store the miscellaneous parameters of a music.
 

Package org.programus.nxj.util.music Description

This package contains music support classes

The basic element of music is note, and it is represented by MusicNote class.
Musics can be built by notes, and Music class represents musics.
SheetParam class is used to store some music sheet related parameters and it will be set to a music to determine how to play the notes sequence in the music.

At last, BGMBox is a background music toolkit. You can use it to play a background music in another thread.
